scrnaseq.cellcomm 1.0.0

Filter agg res by user constraints

filter_agg_res.Rd

Filter agg res by user constraints

Usage

filter_agg_res(
  condition_var = "Condition_dummy",
  input_dir = "",
  interactions_agg_binarized = "",
  interactions_agg_continuous = "",
  output_dir = "."
)

Arguments

condition_var

Variabile containing the 'condition' (group/category) of the samples (default = "Condition_dummy")

input_dir

directory with '402a_filtering_detect_in_multi_samples.rds' and '402b_aggregation_samples.rds', alternatively specify path separately ('interactions_agg_binarized' & 'interactions_agg_continuous') (default = "")

interactions_agg_binarized

path to '402a_filtering_detect_in_multi_samples.rds' (default = "")

interactions_agg_continuous

path to '402b_aggregation_samples.rds' (default = "")

output_dir

output directory for saving output (default = '.')
